recipes.label: Bundled away!
recipes.startdescription: These villains do not intend to kill, but to capture. Right this moment they struggle to seperate one from us.
recipes.description: No one to imprison.

recipes.label: Bundled away!
recipes.startdescription: One of mine was taken, and kept somewhere dark and safe.

recipes.label: A Wandering Guard!
recipes.startdescription: I cannot do this task, as some other task focuses my attention completely, or because this task requires my undivided attention.

slots.label: Help
slots.description: Which implements are available for my approach.

recipes.label: A Wandering Guard!
recipes.startdescription: "Is someone skulkin’ ‘ere?" A wandering guard came upon our gang. They seem interested in capitalizing on the situation... one way or another.

recipes.label: Onward
recipes.description: That unsavory creature is left behind us, and we continue on.

recipes.label: Raised the alarm
recipes.description: We managed to get away, but we made noise and we took some losses.

recipes.label: Guards!
recipes.startdescription: I cannot do this task, as some other task focuses my attention completely, or because this task requires my undivided attention.

slots.label: Help
slots.description: Which implements are available for my approach.

recipes.label: Guards!
recipes.startdescription: Unsavory hoards have come to stop their illegitimate gains from becoming illegitimately mine.

recipes.label: Cracked Bones
recipes.description: The grins of the victors, the moans of the defeated. We stride onward, unopposed.

recipes.label: One Soul Lost
recipes.startdescription: We’ve fended them off, but one of mine was taken.

recipes.label: The Don Approaches
recipes.startdescription: I cannot do this task, as some other task focuses my attention completely, or because this task requires my undivided attention.

slots.label: Help
slots.description: Which implements are available for my approach.

recipes.label: The Don Approaches
recipes.startdescription: A lieutenant came upon us. Fighting seems foolish, but he is willing to talk.

recipes.label: An Understanding
recipes.description: They were mollified, for now. They’ll do their best to stop the buzzing of the bee-hive Warren. But this arrangement is no promise for the future.

recipes.label: Friends in High Places
recipes.description: "Oh, I’ll make sure they know about you. I’ll make sure everyone knows about you."

recipes.label: Explore the Crooked Alley
recipes.startdescription: I cannot do this task, as some other task focuses my attention completely, or because this task requires my undivided attention.

recipes.label: Explore the Crooked Alley
recipes.startdescription: What can we accomplish here? And how do we advance?

recipes.label: Crooked Alley Explored
recipes.description: We’ve seen every inch of this place. There is nothing more for us here.

recipes.label: Ply Information from the Gangsters
recipes.startdescription: In the crooked little alley is a crooked little bar, where the crooked little men celebrate their crooked little lives. Perhaps we can cause their tongues to slip.

recipes.label: Ply Information from the Gangsters
recipes.startdescription: I cannot do this task, as some other task focuses my attention completely, or because this task requires my undivided attention.

recipes.label: Ply Information from the Gangsters
recipes.startdescription: In the crooked little alley is a crooked little bar, where the crooked little men celebrate their crooked little lives. Perhaps we can cause their tongues to slip.

recipes.label: Ply Information from the Gangsters
recipes.startdescription: In the crooked little alley is a crooked little bar, where the crooked little men celebrate their crooked little lives. Perhaps we can cause their tongues to slip.

recipes.label: Meek As Lambs
recipes.description: "No way. Do tell? Here, have another..."

recipes.label: Suspicion Raised
recipes.description: Our questions were too obvious, our words too sweet. They know someone is watching.

recipes.label: Observe the Base
recipes.startdescription: I cannot do this task, as some other task focuses my attention completely, or because this task requires my undivided attention.

recipes.label: Observe the Base
recipes.startdescription: A quiet shadowed corner where we can spend sleepless nights to plan our entry. The more we see, the better we can prepare.

recipes.label: Observe the Base
recipes.startdescription: A quiet shadowed corner where we can spend sleepless nights to plan our entry. The more we see, the better we can prepare.

recipes.label: Patterns Perceived
recipes.description: Our eyes water and our mind is cotton, but we got what we need.

recipes.label: The Observer Observed
recipes.description: "Oi, who's there? Get em!"

recipes.label: Break into the Lot
recipes.startdescription: I cannot do this task, as some other task focuses my attention completely, or because this task requires my undivided attention.

recipes.label: Break into the Lot
recipes.startdescription: Creep through corners and shimmy the lock. Let’s enter this compound unnoticed.

recipes.label: Break into the Lot
recipes.startdescription: Creep through corners and shimmy the lock. Let’s enter this compound unnoticed.

recipes.label: Over the Wall
recipes.description: We passed the gate, and entered the Yard.

recipes.label: Spotted!
recipes.description: We were not as quiet as we ought to have been. We never even made it over the wall.

recipes.label: Explore the Crane Yard
recipes.startdescription: I cannot do this task, as some other task focuses my attention completely, or because this task requires my undivided attention.

recipes.label: Explore the Crane Yard
recipes.startdescription: What can we accomplish here? And how do we advance?

recipes.label: Crane Yard Explored
recipes.description: We’ve seen every inch of this place. There is nothing more for us here.

recipes.label: Scrap the Machine
recipes.startdescription: I cannot do this task, as some other task focuses my attention completely, or because this task requires my undivided attention.

recipes.label: Scrap the Machine
recipes.startdescription: There are useful things here in the Yard. If we take the time, we could come out with some useful stuff. It will be noisy though.

recipes.label: Scrap the Machine
recipes.startdescription: There are useful things here in the Yard. If we take the time, we could come out with some useful stuff. It will be noisy though.

recipes.label: Tools of the Trade
recipes.description: We work quickly and we work quietly. Like scurrying rodents, we take what we can grab. But like foranging rats.

recipes.label: A Commotion
recipes.description: A mistake was made. Metal against metal, or the sound of breaking glass. Soon the guards will be upon us.

recipes.label: Gain Entry to the Warehouse
recipes.startdescription: I cannot do this task, as some other task focuses my attention completely, or because this task requires my undivided attention.

recipes.label: Gain Entry to the Warehouse
recipes.startdescription: By brawn or guile, we need to get into the fortified warehouse itself.

recipes.label: Gain Entry to the Warehouse
recipes.startdescription: By brawn or guile, we need to get into the fortified warehouse itself.

recipes.label: Security breached
recipes.description: Their hold on the stronghold is no longer strong.

recipes.label: Caught
recipes.description: We found a route, but on the other side we were greeted with torch light and raised voices.

recipes.label: Explore the Warren
recipes.startdescription: I cannot do this task, as some other task focuses my attention completely, or because this task requires my undivided attention.

recipes.label: Explore the Warren
recipes.startdescription: We tread lightly, peer around corners and listen at doors. We know where we want to go, but not where to find it.

recipes.label: The Warren Explored
recipes.description: We’ve seen every inch of this place. There is nothing more for us here.

recipes.label: Open the Vault
recipes.startdescription: With the right tools, or the right powders, we can gain entry to this vault.

recipes.label: Open the Vault
recipes.startdescription: With the right tools, or the right powders, we can gain entry to this vault.

recipes.label: A Door Yields
recipes.description: Hinges groan in submission. The contents are ours.

recipes.label: The Victory of Iron
recipes.description: The barrier remains, taunting us... But this vault will not be left alone for long.

recipes.label: Prison Break
recipes.startdescription: The Warehouse is at to high alarm for me to free the prisoners.

recipes.label: Prison Break
recipes.startdescription: I cannot do this task, as some other task focuses my attention completely, or because this task requires my undivided attention.

slots.label: Help
slots.description: Which implements are available for my approach.

recipes.label: Prison Break
recipes.startdescription: Friendly faces faced behind bars. They would be grateful, if we could get them. [I can try to tackle this using Knock.]

recipes.label: Liberation
recipes.startdescription: A satisfying click. A sigh of relief. A clasping of hands.

recipes.label: Foiled
recipes.description: Hollow eyes stare at us, from the hollow between the iron. The door won’t budge. But someone heard the rattle of our efforts.

recipes.label: Free the captives
recipes.startdescription: Freeing the captives...
recipes.description: They're all free now.
